useCase.name: Estimate IT Resources and Costs
useCase.description: Researcher uses the DMPTool Interface to estimate IT resource needs and costs.

preconditions.precondition: The Researcher has project details ready.

successEndConditions.condition: Researcher receives accurate cost estimate and resource requirements.

useCase.trigger: Researcher accesses the DMPTool Interface to estimate IT resources and costs.

mainSequence.step: Researcher inputs project details like data volume and processing power.
DMPTool requests resource requirements input from ITRE.
ITRE inputs project details and returns resource estimates to DMPTool.
DMPTool initiates cost calculation with CCM.
CCM requests pricing data from IS.
IS returns pricing data to CCM.
CCM calculates the cost estimate and returns it to DMPTool.
DMPTool displays the cost estimate and resource needs to the Researcher.
